bestseller_validation.purpose: Cross-reference Kaggle data with research-validated bestsellers
bestseller_validation.method: Ensure all research-identified bestsellers get maximum priority boost
bestseller_validation.validation: Check that Sauvage EDP, Aventus, etc. appear in top 20 of filtered dataset

trend_integration.purpose: Include viral/trending fragrances identified in research
trend_integration.method: Add manual priority for Phlur, Glossier, DedCool, etc.
trend_integration.note: Balance luxury classics with modern viral fragrances

market_accord_weighting.purpose: Use market analysis accord popularity in filtering
market_accord_weighting.method: Slight preference for fragrances with popular accord combinations

research_validation_checks: Sauvage Eau de Parfum must be in top 5
All research bestsellers must be in top 50
Viral trends (Cloud, Missing Person) must be in top 100
Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille must be in top 50
quality_assurance.cross_reference_method: Compare filtered results against research rankings
